35 #ifndef JOINT_LIMITS_INTERFACE_EXTENSION_H
36 #define JOINT_LIMITS_INTERFACE_EXTENSION_H
37 
38 #include "pilz_industrial_motion_planner/joint_limits_extension.h"
39 #include <joint_limits_interface/joint_limits_rosparam.h>
40 
41 namespace pilz_industrial_motion_planner
42 {
43 namespace joint_limits_interface
44 {
48 inline bool getJointLimits(const std::string& joint_name, const ros::NodeHandle& nh,
49  joint_limits_interface::JointLimits& limits)
50 {
51  // Node handle scoped where the joint limits are
52  // defined (copied from ::joint_limits_interface::getJointLimits(joint_name,
53  // nh, limits)
54  ros::NodeHandle limits_nh;
55  try
56  {
57  const std::string limits_namespace = "joint_limits/" + joint_name;
58  if (!nh.hasParam(limits_namespace))
59  {
60  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("No joint limits specification found for joint '"
61  << joint_name << "' in the parameter server (namespace "
62  << nh.getNamespace() + "/" + limits_namespace << ").");
63  return false;
64  }
65  limits_nh = ros::NodeHandle(nh, limits_namespace);
66  }
67  catch (const ros::InvalidNameException& ex)
68  {
69  ROS_ERROR_STREAM(ex.what());
70  return false;
71  }
72 
73  // Set the existing limits
74  if (!::joint_limits_interface::getJointLimits(joint_name, nh, limits))
75  {
76  return false; // LCOV_EXCL_LINE // The case where getJointLimits returns
77  // false is covered above.
78  }
79 
80  // Deceleration limits
81  bool has_deceleration_limits = false;
82  if (limits_nh.getParam("has_deceleration_limits", has_deceleration_limits))
83  {
84  if (!has_deceleration_limits)
85  {
86  limits.has_deceleration_limits = false;
87  }
88  double max_dec;
89  if (has_deceleration_limits && limits_nh.getParam("max_deceleration", max_dec))
90  {
91  limits.has_deceleration_limits = true;
92  limits.max_deceleration = max_dec;
93  }
94  }
95 
96  return true;
97 }
98 } // namespace joint_limits_interface
99 } // namespace pilz_industrial_motion_planner
100 
101 #endif // JOINT_LIMITS_INTERFACE_EXTENSION_H

pilz_industrial_motion_planner::joint_limits_interface::getJointLimits
